column1: #text=I love the sound of the big metal bird racing off the runway .
#text=I have flown when the skies have been blue and other times the sky has been gray .
#text=I ' ve met many people traveling from different places on the globe .
#text=The one thing I will never understand is why the flight attendants only give you a half a can of soda and small bag of peanuts .
#text=I love the safety show the flight attendants put on in case there ' s an emergency .
#text=However , I hate turbulence because it sounds like the plane is banging into other planes in the sky .
#text=One time I flew on a plane with only nine other passengers .
#text=I stretched out like I was at home and watched a movie .
#text=One day I hope to have a concession stand in an airport .
#text=They seemed to make a lot of money off people flying .
